body.name: RADIUS Toothbrush Big Brush with Replaceable Head, Left Hand, Soft in Marble, BPA Free and ADA Accepted, Designed to Improve Gum Health and Reduce the Risk of Gum Disease

asinVariationValues.variationValue: Midnight Sky/ Marble/ Soda Pop Eco Grind

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 8 mins
features: A wider brush means more bristles and more surface area covered at once. This allows for a great cleaning and a soothing massage of your gums.
Our award-winning handle feels so comfortable for righties and Lefties it will be hard to stop brushing.
Less cost than buying a new toothbrush and less waste in our environment are great reasons to keep you smiling.
A plant-based handle and petroleum free bristles leaves the planet as clean as your teeth.
body.description: Weird, wide and wonderful. Super-charged to clean up your mouth and our world, The handle is reusable forever, made from renewable Timber. By using this replacement head, 90 out of every 100 toothbrushes escape the Fate of landfills. Choose a handle that's designed to last and help us turn the tide on the plastic epidemic that litters our fields and clogs our Oceans. The big brush was engineered to protect your mouth and our environment In the Days to come.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My first started using this in high school that was 20 years ago. I couldn’t find them anymore and I decided to look online for this specific brand. Guess what I found it. it is the most amazing toothbrush I’ve been thinking about it for over 20 years. Don’t miss out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Toothbrush Design for Easy Cleaning
reviews.reviewText: Without a doubt this is the best toothbrush I have ever owned. The size of the toothbrush head is perfect for brushing teeth as the bristles (soft) move across the enamel of each tooth removing any debris. I also like that I can position the brush head on the front of my teeth to brush both the top and bottom teeth at the same time as a final sweep as I complete the brushing. I find it doesn't matter if I am just getting up in the morning or I have completed a meal, this toothbrush leaves my mouth feeling clean and polished. The design of the handle makes it very easy to hold and manipulate the bristles as I brush my teeth. I also purchased the carrying case for the toothbrush which works well for travel, and provides a safe place to store my toothbrush while it dries (can lay it open easily on a counter or keep it shut with the air holes allowing the bristles to dry). I highly recommend this toothbrush!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the coverage, mouth feels so clean!
reviews.reviewText: This is an eco friendly, larger toothbrush that I was skeptical to try. After just 3 washes I have fallen in love with this toothbrush. Not too firm but still cleans mouth very well and gets all crevices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fixed head, easy to travel with, sleek design.
reviews.reviewText: I travel 8-10 months out of the year. This brand has never let me down. I’ma lefty, so it’s ergonomic handle is perfect for me. I’ve tried Radius replaceable head toothbrush (it traps a lot of gook between the sections). The travel toothbrush is ok but flimsy. This a fixed toothbrush gives you a good clean and the case keeps your toothbrush of hotel counters which is a major plus for me. The toothbrush itself is solid hard plastic, with a smooth durable feel to it. The bristles are soft and won’t hurt your gums. I get a good clean while using this toothbrush. Very satisfied with my purchase. I would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2013
reviews.reviewText: I have tried many brands and types of toothbrushes. I have found this one to be the best. It is superior to all the rest. This toothbrush is not junk from China. This is a high-quality engineered toothbrush Made in the USA in Pennsylvania. This toothbrush cleans and massages much better than others due in part to the extremely high bristle density and relatively large, but very comfortable head. It lasts a very long time compared to other toothbrushes. The handle has a very intelligent ergonomic design that enables superior cleaning, grip, control, fit, reach, and coverage. The product is BPA free. Two models are available - one for right-handed users and one for left-handed users. I have been using this brand for several years. I use no other. When I have a routine cleaning at the dentist's office, the hygienist and dentist always remark that my teeth are very clean, white, and bright. If you use one of these you probably will decide to use no other toothbrush. If I were a NASA astronaut preparing for residency on the International Space Station for 6 months, I would want 3 or 4 of these toothbrushes in my personal kit. For details and information about this toothbrush, check out the manufacturer's excellent web site with videos. RadiusToothBrush dot com P.S. I have no affiliation with Radius except as a consumer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Big boy toy! Different but cleanse amazing. Could be a bit smaller but definitely outperform any other tooth brush I ever had.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars best & longest lasting tooth brush I've ever used!
reviews.reviewText: I've been using RADIUS toothbrushes for years! These are a new design where the handle has the same shape but the actual brush part is replaceable. Having just gotten a set of 3 with this new design it will be awhile before I'll need new brushes but I'm betting they will work and last as long as the original ones did. I've been using this new design for only a few weeks but so far after every use when I rinse the brush and check the bristles they look like they did when I first opened the package. There are no bent bristles or any sort of distortion that I can see. If you need a new toothbrush, I have no hesitation in recommending these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best brush in the business!
reviews.reviewText: The handle design is excellent and the texture of the bristles are soft & efficient!
Very gentle on the teeth and gums. Thoroughly cleans the teeth. I couldn't go back to a regular toothbrush again.

I really like how big this toothbrush is and how gentle it is on my gums. However, it's made of plastic, so if you're buying it to "save the planet," it's not really made for that purpose. Nevertheless, I personally like it and would buy it again.

reviews.reviewTitle: The gentlest and most effective toothbrush. Also helps if you have gum recession.
reviews.reviewText: I've used these for years and can't go without. They do a thorough cleaning without being harsh enough to damage gums.

reviews.reviewTitle: Geniales, por. Ser grandes limpian SP.bn
reviews.reviewText: Me encantó. El tamaño ya que. Abarca. Más dientes y limpia sp bn,Es. Suave sin dañar el esmalte o encías

I have used Radius tooth brushes for years but finding new ones can a bit of a chore. I have only found them in health food stores at grossly inflated prices and even then not easily. I like the fact that it comes with a good carrying case so that I can throw it into my purse and not worry about the case coming open. These brushes are well made and ergonomically correct which is a huge bonus.
